org.name: United Nations
org.foundingMission: UN was made in 1945 at the end of World War II to replace the League of Nations

org.name: American Red Cross
org.foundingMission: Founded by Clara Barton on May 21, 1881 as a means to provide disaster relief

org.name: US Coast Guard
org.foundingMission: Founded in 1790 as the Revenue Marine

org.name: Federal Reserve
org.foundingMission: Created December 23, 1913 with the Federal Reserve Act

org.name: Lehman Brothers
org.foundingMission: Founded in Montogomery, Alabama in 1850 as a general store by German immigrants

org.name: Haitian Government
org.foundingMission: The government transitioned away from a military government starting in 1987; however it met with opposition. In 1994, Bill Clinton steepped in and had Jimmy Carter lead a negotiating team to help

org.name: Liberation and Justice Movement
org.foundingMission: Founded on February 23, 2010 by several Darfur Sudanese Rebel groups

org.name: UNICEF
org.foundingMission: Created in 1946 by the United Nations to help proved children with food, clothing and care in Europe

org.name: Homeland Security
org.foundingMission: After the September 11 attacks the department of homeland security was created to safegaurd against terrorism within the US and respond to future attacks

org.name: Goldman Sachs
org.foundingMission: Founded by Marcus Goldman in New York City 1869
